org.jasig.cas.services

Interface AttributeReleasePolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAttributeReleasePolicy, ReturnAllAttributeReleasePolicy, ReturnAllowedAttributeReleasePolicy, ReturnMappedAttributeReleasePolicy

    public interface AttributeReleasePolicy
extends Serializable
    The release policy that decides how attributes are to be released for a given service. Each policy has the ability to apply an optional filter.
    Since:
    4.1.0
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> getAttributes(Principal p)
      Gets the attributes, having applied the filter.
      boolean isAuthorizedToReleaseCredentialPassword()
      Is authorized to release credential password?
      boolean isAuthorizedToReleaseProxyGrantingTicket()
      Is authorized to release proxy granting ticket?
      void setAttributeFilter(AttributeFilter filter)
      Sets the attribute filter.
